Report.Code:
' Members ' ************************************************************************* Private UniqueID As String Private bOddRow As Boolean Private m_DarkColour As String Private m_MediumColour As String Private m_LightColour As String Private m_HeaderTextColour As String
' End Members '*************************************************************************
' Properties ' *************************************************************************
Public ReadOnly Property DarkColour() As String
Get If m_DarkColour Is Nothing Then SetColourScheme() End If Return m_DarkColour End Get
End Property
Public ReadOnly Property MediumColour() As String
Get If m_MediumColour Is Nothing Then SetColourScheme() End If Return m_MediumColour End Get
End Property
Public ReadOnly Property LightColour() As String
Get If m_LightColour Is Nothing Then SetColourScheme() End If Return m_LightColour End Get
End Property
Public ReadOnly Property HeaderTextColour() As String
Get If m_HeaderTextColour Is Nothing Then SetColourScheme() End If Return m_HeaderTextColour End Get
End Property
' End Properties ' *************************************************************************
' Private Methods ' ************************************************************************* Private Function SetColourScheme() As Boolean
m_HeaderTextColour = "White"
Dim allColours = Report.Parameters!ReportColours.Value Dim colourArray(3) As String colourArray = Split(allColours, ",")
m_DarkColour = colourArray(0) m_MediumColour = colourArray(1) m_LightColour = colourArray(2)
Return True End Function
' Display green-bar type color banding in detail rows ' Call from BackGroundColor property of all detail row textboxes ' Set Toggle True for first item, False for others. Function AlternateColor(ByVal OddColor As String, _ ByVal EvenColor As String, ByVal Toggle As Boolean) As String If Toggle Then bOddRow = Not bOddRow If bOddRow Then Return OddColor Else Return EvenColor End If End Function
' End Private Methods ' *************************************************************************
' Public Methods ' ************************************************************************* Private Const localResourceAssemblyName As String = "Modules.Reporting" Private Const localResourceNameSpace As String = "Modules.Reporting.Resx" Private Const globalResourceAssemblyName As String = "IONReportResources"
public Function GetGlobalString(ByVal resourcesName As String, ByVal myValue As String) As String Return GetLocalizedString(globalResourceAssemblyName, globalResourceAssemblyName, resourcesName, myValue) End Function
public Function GetLocalString(ByVal resourcesName As String, ByVal myValue As String) As String Return GetLocalizedString(localResourceAssemblyName , localResourceNameSpace , resourcesName, myValue) End Function
public Function GetLocalizedString(ByVal assemblyName As String, ByVal resourceNameSpace As String, ByVal resourcesName As String, ByVal myValue As String) As String Dim cultureString As String cultureString = Report.Parameters!UICulture.Value.ToString() Dim cultureInfo As New System.Globalization.CultureInfo(cultureString)
Dim assembly As System.Reflection.Assembly assembly = System.Reflection.Assembly.Load(assemblyName)
Dim rm As New System.Resources.ResourceManager( resourceNameSpace & "." & resourcesName, assembly) Return rm.GetString(myValue, cultureInfo) End Function
Public Function GetLocalFont(ByVal localUICulture As String) As String Select Case localUICulture.ToLower() Case "zh-cn" GetLocalFont = "SimSun" Case "zh-tw" GetLocalFont = "MingLiu" Case "ja" GetLocalFont = "MS UI Gothic" Case "ko" GetLocalFont = "GulimChe" Case Else GetLocalFont = "Arial" End Select End Function
Public Function GetUniqueID() As String If String.IsNullOrEmpty(UniqueID) Then UniqueID = Guid.NewGuid().ToString() End If Return UniqueID End Function
Public Function GetDatetimePattern() As String Dim cultureString As String cultureString = Report.Parameters!Culture.Value.ToString() Dim cultureInfo As New System.Globalization.CultureInfo(cultureString)
Return cultureInfo.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern & " " & cultureInfo.DateTimeFormat.LongTimePattern End Function
' added individual functions to get the date pattern and time pattern separately ' because we found a problem after the localization of strings was out of the question
Public Function GetDatePattern() As String Dim cultureString As String cultureString = Report.Parameters!Culture.Value.ToString() Dim cultureInfo As New System.Globalization.CultureInfo(cultureString)
Return cultureInfo.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern End Function
Public Function GetTimePattern() As String Dim cultureString As String cultureString = Report.Parameters!Culture.Value.ToString() Dim cultureInfo As New System.Globalization.CultureInfo(cultureString)
Return cultureInfo.DateTimeFormat.LongTimePattern End Function
Public Function GetDatetimeMillisecondPattern() As String Dim cultureString As String cultureString = Report.Parameters!Culture.Value.ToString() Dim cultureInfo As New System.Globalization.CultureInfo(cultureString)
Dim strFormat As String strFormat = cultureInfo.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern & " " & cultureInfo.DateTimeFormat.LongTimePattern if (Instr(strFormat.ToLower(), " tt") > 0) then strFormat = strFormat.Replace(" tt", cultureInfo.NumberFormat.NumberDecimalSeparator & "fff tt") else strFormat = strFormat & cultureInfo.NumberFormat.NumberDecimalSeparator & "fff" end if
return strFormat End Function
Public Function FormatDatetimeMillisecond(ByVal dt As Datetime, ByVal millisecond As Integer) As String Dim ms As New DateTime(dt.Year, dt.Month, dt.Day, dt.Hour, dt.Minute, dt.Second, millisecond)
Return ms.ToString(GetDatetimeMillisecondPattern()) End Function
' End Public Methods ' *************************************************************************
